name: Marbellion
description:
"Just roll with it.." Pro-Dev-logue:

(Started out as a Ouroboros of all 48 Interconnected Themes [Project: Grand-Plan]; Too Resource Heavy for Unity to Handle [at this time; 2020] . 

Instead This is a clutch of a rapid prototype based on a Marbelous-Journey) For Ludum Dare 48; 

The Grand-Plan will wait.. [WIP Post-Jam to eventually Connect between the 'Clutch' Jam Entry and the Temporarily Unnamed 'Grand-Plan']

Objective:

Collect the 48 NomNoms..

Avoid colliding the Abyss-Plane

Controls:

WSAD - Roll it..

Q - Teleport to Start (will cost you a NomNom)

Space - Jump
